I've played this game since like 2015 and it has given me a lot of great memories. I was once the best game in the world. Now, it feels different. Non-prime matchmaking is basically ruined since the game became free, so you pretty much are forced to pay for it. However, I think that buying prime matchmaking is 100% worth it. I've had some amazing moments playing this game throughout the years, had some great friends that came and went, and I've had some games with the worst most toxic people ever. That's what makes this game fun, queuing up and not knowing what you're gonna get. 100% would recommend.
